Assume that u want to test a application whose main method is in "Sample"
class
// import ur application related packages / classes
 
public class SampleTest extends TestCase
{
   ...
   // constructor changes 
    public SampleTest(String args)
    {
        super(args);
        String[] myargs={"argument1"};  // single argument ... for multiple
arg ... myargs={"argument1","argument2","argument3", ...}
        
       // to run ur application, u must invoke ur application's main method
...
 
        Sample.main(myargs);
    }
 
   protected void setUp() { ....}
   protected void tearDown() {....}
   
   // add ur test cases
    public void test...() { ...}
   ..
   ..
}
